name: smrt-seller-app
description: Amazon Seller Central automation tool for efficient listing management
author: Owen Dorsey

scripts.dev:electron: npm run transpile:electron && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron .
scripts.build: npm run install:browsers && npm run copy:browsers && tsc && vite build
scripts.sign:playwright: codesign --force --options runtime --entitlements build/entitlements.mac.plist --deep --sign 'Developer ID Application: Owen Dorsey (GQN9G64546)' playwright-browsers/firefox-1471/firefox/Nightly.app
scripts.dist:mac: npm run transpile:electron && npm run build && npm run sign:playwright && cross-env DEBUG=electron-builder,electron-builder:*,electron-osx-sign node -r dotenv/config ./node_modules/.bin/electron-builder --mac --arm64
scripts.sign:mac: codesign --force --deep --verbose --options=runtime --entitlements build/entitlements.mac.plist --sign 'Developer ID Application: Owen Dorsey (GQN9G64546)' 'dist/mac-arm64/SMRT Seller.app' && codesign --verify --verbose --deep 'dist/mac-arm64/SMRT Seller.app'
scripts.dist:win: npm run transpile:electron && npm run build && electron-builder --win --x64
scripts.dist:linux: npm run transpile:electron && npm run build && electron-builder --linux --x64
